channel.title: Coordinate command help
channel.description: How would i go about making the coordinates appear in the lower corner of the corner like in the Moparscape Client 3.2 w/Aryan? I am using Devolution v7

item.title: Coordinate command help
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“Kindler, post:2, topic:236499”]you can find the coords in the running tab (emote tab)
Also just use www.client.silabsoft.org[/quote]

That has no relevance to what he just asked.

Staying on topic:

You would use frames to make the coordinates appear on the bottom right
Hand corner for example,
Although you’ll have to find out the frames yourself.

Read full topic
